devdoc.details: A secure bank contract that allows users to deposit and withdraw ETH and ERC20 tokens with transaction limits and total deposit caps.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

constructor.details: Constructor sets the initial owner, bank cap, and withdrawal limit

params.bankCapUSD: Maximum total deposits allowed in USD (8 decimals)
params.withdrawalLimitUSD: Maximum withdrawal per transaction in USD (8 decimals)

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposit ETH or ERC20 tokens into the bank

params.amount: Amount to deposit (in wei or token units)
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to deposit (address(0) for ETH)

getBalance(address,address).details: Get the balance of a specific token for a user

params.tokenAddress: Address of the token (address(0) for ETH)

returns._0: User's balance of the specified token

getTotalDepositsInUSD().details: Get the total value of all deposits in USD (8 decimals)

getUSDValue(address,uint256).details: Get the USD value of an amount of tokens

params.amount: Amount of tokens to get value for
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token (address(0) for ETH)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recoverTokens(address).details: Emergency withdraw tokens sent to the contract by mistake

params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to recover

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: Amount to withdraw (in wei or token units)
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to withdraw (address(0) for ETH)

devdoc.title: KipuBankV2
